about_the_game:
The Gra'D'e Sword is a turn-based game in which you fight by controlling the stages of a sword with a randomly changing sword.
Increase the variety of swords you can change to fulfill your obligations as a soldier and move forward, defeating enemies that stand in your way!

feature
ㅇ upgrade, downgrade
Of course, the higer grade weapons of the Grade Sword have more stats than those of lower grades. If you have a lot of upgrade points, you can change it back to a weapon after downgrading. And if you collect weapons with special abilities as you progress through the game, you can get weapons with stats regardless of rank.

ㅇ Increasing weapons, various mini-games, sudden events, complicated entanglement probability
Players at the beginning of the adventure can only change their weapons to weapons without special abilities, no matter how many upgrade points they have. However, if you kill monsters, choose a card, pray to a fanatic, etc., you can get a weapon with the powerful ability you want, or you can get a weapon with a lower stat than now and pollute the probability.

ㅇFactors that annoy players
Gradesword is a turn-based combat game, but the bullying is real-time.
While thinking about strategies and preparing to review odds, the king(?) steals potions and gold and tries to escape.

short_description: Gra'D'e Sword is a turn-based strategy rogue like game in which a soldier with a changing weapon takes the king to the castle by removing obstacles. Get the possibility of new weapons with mini-games, events, and money, and beat the probability to safely take the king to the castle.
